description: Analyzes Instagram post performance data to extract patterns, trends, and top-performing content insights

top_posts.insights: This post featured a carousel with behind-the-scenes content, which generated high saves and shares.
A short educational Reel provided quick tips; its engaging format led to increased comments and reshares.
A user-generated photo contest post attracted above-average likes and strong community participation.

performance_patterns: Carousel posts and Reels consistently outperform static images in engagement rate.
Educational content and tips drive more saves and shares.
Posts that encourage follower participation (e.g., contests, questions) see higher comment volumes.
result.posting_insights: The account posts an average of 3-4 times per week, with better engagement observed on weekday afternoons. Video formats (Reels/IGTV) are increasingly effective. Content mix is balanced but adding more Reels and interactive posts could further boost engagement.
